item.title: First Week
item.description: So my first week of college just wrapped up so I thought I’d share my thoughts about how it went down.

item.title: Books
item.description: CURRENTLY READING: Electra and Other Plays (Philoctetes, Women of Trachis, Electra, Ajax) - Sophocles Gotrek and Felix, The First Omnibus (Trollslayer, Skavenslayer, Daemonslayer) - William King Songs of Innocence and of Experience - William Blake The Monkey Wrench Gang - Edward Abbey Here are all the books I’ve read sorted by the month I finished them, started around May 2022 DECEMBER 2023 The Theban Plays (King Oedipus, Oedipus at Colonus, Antigone) - Sophocles NOVEMBER 2023 The Song of Achilles - Madeline Miller OCTOBER 2023 The Secret History - Donna Tartt SEPTEMBER 2023 The Last of The Wine - Mary Renault Storyland - Amy Jeffs JUNE 2023 The Sailor Who Fell From Grace With The Sea - Yukio Mishima Selected Poems - Langston Hughes Cider With Rosie - Laurie Lee MAY 2023 The Graveyard Book - Neil Gaiman The Unfortunates - B.

item.title: Plans Before College
item.description: I start college in little under a month so I thought it’d be a good idea to go over what I’m doing to ease myself back into education.

item.title: First Steps With LMMS
item.description: I recently decided to start recording some of the songs I make with my acoustic guitar. The problem is that with my current setup anything I record sounds like shit.

item.title: College
item.description: My college files can be found here.
